Our Comprehensive Web Services

Custom Web Design

We create bespoke websites that perfectly represent your brand and engage your audience. Learn more about Custom Web Design

  • Responsive Design for All Devices
  • User Experience (UX) Optimization
  • Brand Identity Integration
  • Content Management System (CMS) Integration
  • E-commerce Functionality
  • Custom Graphics and Illustrations
  • Website Analytics Setup

Our team works closely with you to understand your brand identity and business goals, ensuring the website we design not only looks great but also drives results.

Website Management & Maintenance

Let us handle the technical details while you focus on your business. Learn more about Website Management

  • Security Monitoring & Updates
  • Backup & Recovery Solutions
  • Content Updates & Management
  • Performance Optimization
  • 24/7 Uptime Monitoring
  • Technical Support

We provide comprehensive maintenance services to keep your website running smoothly, ensuring it's always up-to-date and secure.

Accessibility & Compliance

Ensure your website is accessible to all users and compliant with regulations. Learn more about Accessibility

  • WCAG Compliance Audits
  • Accessible Design Implementation
  • Keyboard Navigation Optimization
  • Alt Text for Images
  • Captioning & Transcripts for Multimedia
  • Compliance Reporting
  • Ongoing Accessibility Maintenance

Our expertise in accessibility ensures your website meets ADA standards, reducing legal risks and expanding your audience.

Search Engine & Performance Optimization

Boost your online visibility and enhance user experience with our SEO and performance optimization services. Learn more about SEO & Performance Optimization

  • Comprehensive Keyword Research
  • Meta Tags & Content Optimization
  • Technical SEO Audits & Fixes
  • Structured Data & Schema Markup
  • Page Speed & Performance Enhancements
  • Mobile-Friendly Design Implementation
  • XML Sitemap & Robots.txt Configuration

Our SEO experts optimize your website to rank higher on search engines, driving more organic traffic and increasing conversions.

Our Reviews

Words From Our Customers

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ 5 out of 5 stars

We hired Ian for two web projects: SolTecLabs.com & SolTecElectronics.com and would highly recommend his work. With just a small amount of direction given, Ian was able to create two well-designed sites that showcased our content and capabilities beautifully! His after-design follow-up is excellent as he worked closely with us on ironing out any/all small details until everything was perfected (unlike some web-designers that disappear when the check clears the bank!) Ian is somebody that you can count on long-term to work with you as your web-site needs continue to change and grow. His graphic art capabilities and creativity are quite impressive as well - great logo design work & web-page interface that all blend together nicely. He's quick to return an email or phone call & works within deadlines given too. Thanks Ian!

Dawn

President & CEO - Soltec Electronics
